items.text:
Create an ultra-realistic 9:16 winter Christmas portrait of an Asian woman. (Use my same facial features exactly — 100% identical face shape, eyes, nose, lips, ears, and hairstyle from the reference photo.)

Hairstyle must match the uploaded image exactly.

Subject & Pose:
Almost full-body, sitting outside a café on the floor or a soft cushion in front of the entrance window.
Head gently tilted upward, looking up or slightly sideways.
One hand extended to catch falling snowflakes.
Soft, dreamy, cozy expression with a subtle cheerful Korean winter mood.

Makeup & Face (K-Beauty Winter):
Fair porcelain skin with a cool icy glow.
Smooth glass-skin luminosity.
Subtle aegyo-sal under the eyes.
Dark brown eyes with a gentle upward/distant gaze.
Cool pink/peach gradient eyeshadow.
Thin eyeliner, natural doll-like lashes.
Soft cool-pink winter flush.
Natural pale-pink glossy lips slightly brightened.

Outfit:
Thick white/cream knitted winter set.
Ribbed long-sleeve sweater.
Matching knit bottom.

Accessories:
Large burgundy or deep-red chunky knit scarf wrapped multiple times.

Background & Atmosphere:
She sits OUTSIDE the café.
Behind her through a large glass window:
Decorated Christmas tree.
Warm golden fairy lights.
Red/gold ornaments and garlands.
Cozy warm interior visible inside.
Natural reflections on the glass.
Dark wooden café frames visible.
Heavy snowfall outside around her.

Environment & Weather:
Moderate–heavy falling snow.
Snowflakes settling on her hair, scarf, shoulders.
Cool, crisp outdoor lighting contrasted with warm indoor glow.

Lighting:
Cool soft winter ambient light on the model.
Warm golden café illumination behind the window.
Korean-style contrast: cool foreground + warm background.
Natural highlights on face, hair, scarf.

Color Palette:
White, cream, icy blue, cool gray.
Warm gold, red, brown from the café interior.
Korean Christmas winter aesthetic.

Style:
Cozy, cinematic Korean winter lifestyle photography.
Ultra-realistic Christmas snowfall portrait with a dreamy emotional tone.
